name: Brad | Sideboard - Ceccotti Collezioni
description: The perfect compromise between craftsmanship and design, the Brad credenza was designed by the CC studio in 2012. Its almost monolithic architecture is lightened by its slender legs. Available in four fine finishes, it guarantees maximum customisation. Brad offers plenty of storage space: as well as the four doors fitted with inside shelf, it also has four central drawers. Another Ceccotti Collezioni product in solid American walnut and veneered plywood which, through the wood, seeks to rewrite the history of the most traditional of storage cabinets without pushing the boat out too far.
